about_the_game:
Cold Salvage is a co-operative survival game.

Take on the role of a blue-collar salvage engineer. Take contracts, working in the cold depths of space - in a job full of danger and riches. Claim your own tug from the junkyards, and earn credits to upgrade and repair it's systems. Then work with your team to return abandoned vessels to service... but watch for what lurks in the dark.

Stemming the tide of war depends on you. Return the warships to the docks, or destroy them where they drift. The horrors on board cannot be allowed to reach Earth.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains horror elements, monsters and player death
